title: Lincoln's WARNING #100007: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Listen carefully... They're not reporting social media algorithm changes—they're performing it. Each fear, each outrage, another coin in their slot machine. The news doesn't inform you. It trains you. Break free. Bitcoin below. Stop scrolling. Social Media Algorithm Changes? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
